data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
My intention with the Scripting:: namespace is to provide Perl
    developers with a uniform interface for different scripting langues,
    such as JavaScript, Tcl, Python et al, similar to the Bean Scripting
    Framework (http://jakarta.apache.org/bsf/index.html) available for
    Java.

    If Scripting:: is a too generalized namespace, PSF:: (Perl
    Scripting Framework), Scripting::PSF:: or equivalent will do just
    fine.
